original_text:
But he answered, “You give them something to eat.”
They said to him, “That would take more than half a year’s wages! Are we to go and spend that much on bread and give it to them to eat?”
korean_text: 대답하여 이르시되 너희가 먹을 것을 주라 하시니 여짜오되 우리가 가서 이백 데나리온의 떡을 사다 먹이리이까

sentences.original_text: You give them something to eat
That would take more than half a year's wages
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 반년 이상의 품삯이 필요할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Are we to go and spend that much on bread
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 가서 그那么多 돈을 빵에 쓰겠습니까

sentences.original_text: and give it to them to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 그들에게 주어 먹게 하겠습니까
